<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find out how many times region R is cloned. Note that if the parent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of R is cloned, R is also cloned, but R&#39;s clone count is not updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the clone of the parent. We need to accumlate all the counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the ancestors to get the clone count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> += DuplicationCount&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constructs the true and false branch probabilities if the the instruction has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// valid branch weights. Returns true when this was successful, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579" lineLink="#afb9349865f6045be3029d7d171f23f4e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#afb9349865f6045be3029d7d171f23f4e">extractBranchProbabilities</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> &amp;TrueProb,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> &amp;FalseProb) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t TrueWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t FalseWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, TrueWeight, FalseWeight))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t SumWeight = TrueWeight + FalseWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SumWeight &gt;= TrueWeight &amp;&amp; SumWeight &gt;= FalseWeight &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Overflow calculating branch probabilities.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Guard against 0-to-0 branch weights to avoid a division-by-zero crash.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SumWeight == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TrueProb = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(TrueWeight, SumWeight);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the instruction at which to hoist the dependent condition values and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insert the CHR branch for a region. This is the terminator branch in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry block or the first select in the entry block, if any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677" lineLink="#ace82efda93a438644ce877d6975851b7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>&#42; <a href="#ace82efda93a438644ce877d6975851b7">getBranchInsertPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a> &amp;RI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> &#42;R = RI.R;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;EntryBB = R-&gt;getEntry();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The hoist point is by default the terminator of the entry block, which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same as the branch instruction if RI.HasBranch is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;HoistPoint = EntryBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> : RI.Selects) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getParent() == EntryBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pick the first select in Selects in the entry block.  Note Selects is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sorted in the instruction order within a block (asserted below).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HoistPoint = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(HoistPoint &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Null HoistPoint&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that any of the branch and the selects in the region could be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hoisted above the the CHR branch insert point (the most dominating of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them, either the branch (at the end of the first block) or the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// select in the first block). If the branch can&#39;t be hoisted, drop the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// selects in the first blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, for the following scope/region with selects, we want to insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the merged branch right before the first select in the first/entry block by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hoisting c1, c2, c3, and c4.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// // Branch insert point here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a = c1 ? b : c; // Select 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// d = c2 ? e : f; // Select 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (c3) &#123; // Branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c4 = foo() // A call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   g = c4 ? h : i; // Select 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But suppose we can&#39;t hoist c4 because it&#39;s dependent on the preceding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call. Then, we drop Select 3 Furthermore, if we can&#39;t hoist c2, we also drop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Select 2 If we can&#39;t hoist c3, we drop Selects 1 &amp; 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CHR::checkScopeHoistable(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-controlheightreduction-cpp-/chrscope/#a0c00453a05c126ba39bcb8cbad32d4b2">CHRScope</a> &#42;Scope) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine whether to split a scope depending on the sets of the branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition values of the previous region and the current region. We split</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (return true) it if 1) the condition values of the inner/lower scope can&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hoisted up to the outer/upper scope, or 2) the two sets of the condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values have an empty intersection (because the combined branch conditions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// won&#39;t probably lead to a simpler combined condition).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are already above the hoist point. Stop here. This may be necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when multiple scopes would independently hoist the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction. Since an outer (dominating) scope would hoist it to its</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// potentially wrong for the inner scope to hoist it and could cause bad</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IR (non-dominating def), but safe to skip hoisting it instead because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s already in a block that dominates the inner scope.</span></CodeLine>
